mapper.select: SELECT MAX(date) FROM covid_data WHERE department_id = #{departmentId} and municipality_id is NULL and status = 1
SELECT MAX(date) FROM covid_data WHERE country_id = #{countryId} and department_id is NULL and municipality_id is NULL and status = 1
SELECT MAX(a.date) FROM covid_data a, municipality b WHERE b.municipality = #{municipality} and b.municipality_id = a.municipality_id and b.department_id = a.department_id and a.status = 1
select COUNT(covid_data_id) from covid_data where department_id = #{departmentId} and municipality_id is NULL and status = 1

SELECT a.covid_data_id as id, a.date as date, a.confirmed as confirmed, a.deaths as deaths, a.recovered as recovered, b.first_vaccine as firstVaccine, b.second_vaccine as secondVaccine FROM covid_data a, vaccine b WHERE a.department_id = #{departmentId} and b.department_id = a.department_id and a.date = b.date and a.municipality_id is NULL and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT a.covid_data_id as id, a.date as date, a.cumulative_confirmed as confirmed, a.cumulative_deaths as deaths, a.cumulative_recovered as recovered, b.first_vaccine as firstVaccine, b.second_vaccine as secondVaccine FROM covid_data a, vaccine b WHERE a.department_id = #{departmentId} and b.department_id = a.department_id and a.date = b.date and a.municipality_id is NULL and a.status = 1 and b.status = 1 LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT b.department_id as departmentId, b.iso as iso, b.department as department, MAX(a.cumulative_confirmed) as confirmed, MAX(a.cumulative_deaths) as deaths, MAX(a.cumulative_recovered) as recovered, MAX(d.first_vaccine) as firstVaccine, MAX(d.second_vaccine) as secondVaccine, b.zoom as zoom, b.longitude as longitude, b.latitude as latitude FROM covid_data a, department b, country c, vaccine d WHERE c.iso = #{countryISO} and c.country_id=b.country_id and d.department_id = b.department_id and b.department_id=a.department_id and a.municipality_id is NULL and b.status = 1 GROUP BY b.department;

SELECT b.country_id as countryId, b.iso as iso, b.country as country, MAX(a.cumulative_confirmed) as cumulativeConfirmed, MAX(a.cumulative_deaths) as cumulativeDeaths, MAX(a.date) as date, b.latitude as latitude, b.longitude as longitude FROM covid_data a, country b WHERE a.country_id=b.country_id and a.department_id is null and a.municipality_id is null and a.status = 1 GROUP BY b.country;

SELECT b.department_id as departmentId, b.iso as iso, b.department as department, MAX(a.cumulative_confirmed) as confirmed, MAX(a.cumulative_deaths) as deaths, MAX(a.cumulative_recovered) as recovered, MAX(d.first_vaccine) as firstVaccine, MAX(d.second_vaccine) as secondVaccine, b.zoom as zoom, b.longitude as longitude, b.latitude as latitude FROM covid_data a, department b, country c, vaccine d WHERE c.iso = #{countryISO} and c.country_id=b.country_id and d.department_id = b.department_id and b.department_id=a.department_id and a.municipality_id is NULL and b.status = 1 GROUP BY b.department;

SELECT b.municipality as municipality, a.cumulative_confirmed as confirmed, a.cumulative_deaths as deaths, a.cumulative_recovered as recovered, b.longitude as longitude, b.latitude as latitude FROM covid_data a, municipality b, country c, department d WHERE c.iso = #{countryISO} and d.iso=#{isoDepartment} AND b.municipality_id=a.municipality_id and c.country_id=d.country_id and d.department_id=a.department_id and d.status = 1

SELECT a.date as date1, d.department as department, a.confirmed as confirmed, a.cumulative_confirmed as totalconfirmed, a.deaths as deaths, a.cumulative_deaths as totalDeaths, a.recovered as recovered, a.cumulative_recovered as totalrecovered FROM covid_data a, country c, department d WHERE c.iso = #{countryIso} and d.iso=#{departmentIso} and a.municipality_id is NULL and c.country_id=a.country_id and d.department_id=a.department_id and a.status = 1

SELECT SUM(cumulative_confirmed) as confirmed, SUM(cumulative_deaths) as deaths, MAX(date) as date FROM covid_data WHERE department_id is null and municipality_id is null and date = (SELECT MAX(date) FROM covid_data) and status = 1

SELECT a.date as date, a.confirmed as confirmed, a.cumulative_confirmed as cumulativeConfirmed, a.deaths as deaths, a.cumulative_deaths as cumulativeDeaths, a.recovered as recovered, a.cumulative_recovered as cumulativeRecovered, c.first_vaccine as firstVaccine, c.second_vaccine as secondVaccine FROM covid_data a, vaccine c WHERE a.department_id = #{departmentId} and c.department_id = #{departmentId} and a.department_id = c.department_id and a.municipality_id is NULL and a.date = c.date and a.status = 1

SELECT b.date as dateCountry, SUM(b.first_vaccine) as firstVaccine, SUM(b.second_vaccine) as secondVaccine FROM vaccine b, department d, country a WHERE a.iso =#{isoCountry} and d.country_id=a.country_id and b.department_id = d.department_id and a.status = 1 GROUP BY b.date LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT a.date as dateCountry, SUM(a.cumulative_confirmed) as totalconfirmed, SUM(a.cumulative_deaths) as totalDeaths, SUM(a.cumulative_recovered) as totalrecovered, b.longitude as longitude, b.latitude as latitude FROM covid_data a, country b WHERE b.iso =#{isoCountry} and a.date = #{dateCountry} and a.municipality_id is NULL and a.department_id is NOT NULL and b.country_id = a.country_id and a.status = 1
SELECT MAX(date) FROM covid_data WHERE status = 1
SELECT SUM(a.first_vaccine) as firstVaccine, SUM(a.second_vaccine) as secondVaccine FROM vaccine a WHERE a.status = 1 and a.date = #{dateCountry}

SELECT a.date as dateCountry, SUM(a.confirmed) as confirmed, SUM(a.deaths) as deaths, SUM(a.recovered) as recovered FROM covid_data a,country c, department d WHERE c.iso = #{isoCountry} and a.municipality_id is NULL and c.country_id=a.country_id and d.department_id=a.department_id and a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.date LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT a.date as dateCountry, SUM(a.cumulative_confirmed) as totalconfirmed, SUM(a.cumulative_deaths) as totalDeaths, SUM(a.cumulative_recovered) as totalrecovered FROM covid_data a,country c, department d WHERE c.iso = #{isoCountry} and a.municipality_id is NULL and c.country_id=a.country_id and d.department_id=a.department_id and a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.date LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT SUM(cumulative_confirmed) as confirmed, SUM(cumulative_deaths) as deaths, date as date FROM covid_data WHERE department_id is null and municipality_id is null GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}

SELECT SUM(confirmed) as confirmed, SUM(deaths) as deaths, date as date FROM covid_data WHERE department_id is null and municipality_id is null GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{page}
